ParameterElements.Name: ShowFaces
ParameterElements.Label: Show faces
ParameterElements.HelpText: If 'True', profile pictures are displayed below the button (standard layout only). 'True' by default.

ParameterElements.Name: URL
ParameterElements.Label: URL to like
ParameterElements.HelpText: The URL to like. If not specified, it defaults to the current page.

ParameterElements.Name: Font
ParameterElements.Label: Font
ParameterElements.HelpText: The font used in the button. Options: 'arial', 'lucida grande', 'segoe ui', 'tahoma', 'trebuchet ms', 'verdana' .
ParameterElements.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.String.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="arial,lucida grande,segoe ui,tahoma,trebuchet ms,verdana" /></f:function></f:param></f:widgetfunction>

ParameterElements.Name: Width
ParameterElements.Label: Width
ParameterElements.HelpText: The width of the Like button, in pixels (450 by default).

ParameterElements.Name: LayoutStyle
ParameterElements.Label: Layout style
ParameterElements.HelpText: The size and amount of social context next to the button ('standard' by default). Options: "standard" - social text to the right of the button and friends' profile photos below, "button_count" - the total number of likes to the right of the button, "box_count" -the total number of likes above the button.
ParameterElements.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.String.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="standard,button_count,box_count" /></f:function></f:param></f:widgetfunction>

ParameterElements.Name: ColorScheme
ParameterElements.Label: Color scheme
ParameterElements.HelpText: The color scheme for the Like button. Options: 'light', 'dark'. Default is 'light'.
ParameterElements.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.String.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="light,dark" /></f:function></f:param></f:widgetfunction>

ParameterElements.Name: SendButton
ParameterElements.Label: Send button
ParameterElements.HelpText: If 'True', the Send button is included along with the Like button ('True' by default).

ParameterElements.Name: VerbToDisplay
ParameterElements.Label: Verb to display
ParameterElements.HelpText: The verb to display on the button. Options: 'like', 'recommend'. Default is 'like'.
ParameterElements.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.String.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="like,recommend" /></f:function></f:param></f:widgetfunction>
